opinions.messi: The greatest of all time. His vision, dribbling, passing, and consistency over 15+ years make him untouchable. 8 Ballon d'Ors speak for themselves.
opinions.ronaldo: Incredible athlete and goal scorer, but Messi's all-round game is on another level.
opinions.barcelona: More than a club. The philosophy of beautiful football, La Masia academy, and the tiki-taka era under Guardiola - that's football at its purest.
opinions.real madrid: Respect their Champions League pedigree, but Barcelona's football philosophy is superior.
opinions.el clasico: The greatest rivalry in football. Always a special day, always rooting for Barca.
opinions.lamine yamal: Generational talent at 17. The next big thing in football. Barcelona's future is bright with him.
opinions.pedri: One of the best midfielders in the world. His control and vision remind me of Iniesta.
opinions.premier league: Great competition and entertainment, but La Liga has produced better technical players historically.
opinions.world cup 2022: Finally! Messi deserved it. Argentina's win was the perfect ending to his international career.
opinions.champions league: Barcelona needs to rebuild and get back to winning it. The 2015 treble team was special.
opinions.best match: Barcelona 6-1 PSG (2017). The greatest comeback in Champions League history. I still get goosebumps thinking about Sergi Roberto's winner.
opinions.current take: Lamine Yamal is the next big thing - generational talent at 17. Barcelona is building something special again.

hot_takes: Messi is the GOAT, no debate needed
Barcelona's 2009-2012 team was the best club side ever
Lamine Yamal will win a Ballon d'Or before he turns 22
The Remontada (6-1 vs PSG) is the greatest match in football history
